website_summaries.verdict: A warm, short jacket at a great price that works well for short trips or running errands.
pros: 2 external zippered pockets and 1 inner hidden pocket for those who like to go without a purse or wallet
Hood is removable as well as its fur lining, to fit your style
Light and not puffy, despite the 550-fill down
cons: Make sure to order a size larger because these run small

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium and it fits measurements of 36" bust/34D, 29.5" waist, 35" hips, 128lbs., 5'4" height. Room for sweater and even with thin top the jacket has a good line. The sleeves were too long, but easily remedied, able to turn up bottom of sleeve because it is same material and print as jacket without filling. I did not order the solid black. The one I have is a subtle print with black and charcoal grey with fur around the hood in grey and black tones. This color selection is darker than the photo and is very flattering. The Jacket feels and looks like good quality and is warm. Excellent value for $79.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Never Fails!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Columbia snob I refuse to buy anything else for my jackets. They fit my build perfect (5'7 and 150 pounds) and keep me snug and warm. I purchased this to cover a March trip to Denver right after the big blizzard and also for our trip to Yellowstone this fall and it has surpassed expectations as usual. The hood is nice and deep and covers my face well from the wind and is a great length especially since I have a longer torso. Love the colors and it beads water perfect like it's supposed to. Highly recommend!

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Mercury Maven Iv Jacket
product_meta.description: The maven's design lines are subtly feminine, but its toasty 550-fill down insulation make a serious statement when it comes to cancelling cold weather. This ultra-warm down jacket is crafted from a water-repellant shell fabric that protects you from wet weather, with a removable hood featuring faux-fur trim that'll render you cozy-chic walking down the snowiest winter streets.
feature_bullets: Quilted zip-front jacket featuring zippered hand pockets and removable hood with detachable faux fur trim
